sentences_tone.text: yes Well, my name is darshee, i am a CS graduate.
I love challenges and i would love to learn new things going ahead.
proceed I really admire what this company stands for and i want to see myself be a part of its workforce.
It can help me achieve my goals and i believe i can be of value to this esteemed organization.
proceed I would say that my greatest strengths include team work and multitasking, my weaknesses would be my shy nature, that might hold me back from voicing my opinions.
proceed My dream job would be an endeavor that would allow me to try new things, tackle fresh challenges and work with good, enthusiastic and passionate people.
proceed I believe that i am a fast learner and a very passionate employee.
I will excel at the tasks handed to me and i am sure i will prove to be a valuable asset to this company.
